definitions.title: n.pr. 1.m. a.
definitions.body: son of Japhet Ge 10:2, Ge 10:3 = 1Ch 1:5, 1Ch 1:6, Ez Eze 38:6; Lag :Onom. Sacr. 2, 95, 2nd ed. 367, v. BN 77 prop. [[גמרים]] for [[גמדים]] Ez Eze 27:11 q.v.; he identif. [[גּׁמֶר]] with Cappadocia (cf. Targum Ez Eze 27:11, Kiep:Lb. d. alt. Geogr. 91) = Armen. Gamiṛ -x (with pl. ending) v. also Lag:Arm. Stud. 32 § 448; cf. further As.Gimirrai, Schr:KG 157 ff. Dl:Pa 245 f. also Len:Or.ii. 1, 332 ff.
